Method.name: SetConfig
Method.Implementation: set ns = $Namespace zn "%SYS" set Properties("Attributes",App)= $lb(Config) set st =##class(Security.Users).Modify($Username,.Properties) zn ns return st

Method.name: GetConfig
Method.Implementation: set ns = $Namespace zn "%SYS" set st =##class(Security.Users).Get($Username,.Properties) zn ns return $lg(Properties("Attributes",App))
